column2: 1963@Letter to Horace Waller@Letter to Horace Waller
column8: Universities' Mission to Central Africa 1860-64. Curate
column9: St. John's Chatham 1867-70. Vicar of Leytonstone
column10: 1870-74. Rector of Twywell
column11: 1874-95. In addition to editing Livingstone's Last Journals
column12: wrote several articles on slavery and the slave trade in Africa.@@@@@@@@letters@@autographs (manuscripts)@spectral color@Livingstone Online (http://livingstoneonline.org/)@5 February 1871@1871-02-05@Manyema@Maniema (Congo)@@@-2.95
column15: with writing on 4 pages@folio@Peter Beard Studio@@local@repository@@Images © Peter and Nejma Beard. Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/).@@@@@@@@@@@@Sotheby's Cat.
